title: SDQ vs HRQOL
url: "/compare-harmonise-instruments/sdq-vs-hrqol/"
date: 2025-02-06
---

## SDQ vs HRQOL

SDQ vs HRQOL: Streamlining the Comparison Process The task of comparing and harmonising the Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire (SDQ) and Health-related Quality of Life (HRQOL) can be a complex and time-consuming job for psychologists and researchers. With the advancement of AI technology, a software tool called Harmony provides an efficient solution to this challenge. Utilizing natural language processing, Harmony significantly simplifies the process of aligning questionnaire items in these two instruments in SDQ vs HRQOL comparisons. Harmony helps in identifying the similarities and discrepancies between the SDQ and HRQOL questionnaires. By evaluating questionnaire items one by one, Harmony generates a percentage match between each corresponding question in both instruments. The tool is also multi-lingual, thus facilitating comparisons in multiple languages in SDQ vs HRQOL examinations. For psychologists, using Harmony for SDQ vs HRQOL comparisons not only saves valuable time but also enhances the accuracy and objectivity of the harmonisation process. The easy-to-use interface, where you can drag and drop your PDF questionnaires, makes the process user-friendly. With Harmony, SDQ vs HRQOL comparison has never been easier or more reliable. This tool brings harmony to comparison tasks, enabling psychologists to focus more on analysis and research advancement.

## Compare the items in SDQ and HRQOL
